"Amongst the Dunes":
"There has been a rash of reports of small
shadowy figures on the desert planet
Lillipa. A cast named Fourier is insisting on
rescuing these phantoms.

She begs you to accompany her to Lillipa
to find them, but more and more Mechs
have been activating recently...
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Retire after being incapacitated"
